item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Ruben. I am interested in building products, software, and management. I currently work as a team lead and software engineer at Spacemaker where we try to find better ways to design our cities. Previously I have co-founded two companies: A traditional startup, Jobbr, a platform where you could undertake and post smaller jobs, and Korde, a consulting company that helped startups and established companies with business and software development.
